C

Category - Class in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.entities
The persistent class for the category database table.
Category() - Constructor for class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.entities.Category
 
CategoryDTO - Class in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.dto
This is the class the acts as a Data Transfer Object for the Entity Category that transfer information from the front end to the back end and vice versa.
CategoryDTO() - Constructor for class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.dto.CategoryDTO
 
CategoryRepository - Interface in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.repository
This is a Repository that extends from the CrudRepository defined by Spring framework to handle database operations of the Entity type Category.
CategoryService - Class in com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services
This is a Service Class for the generated entity Category that does the CRUD operations by making calls to the Repository of the appropriate type.
CategoryService() - Constructor for class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services.CategoryService
 
com.bucketlist.aaron.Bucketlist - package com.bucketlist.aaron.Bucketlist

com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.repository - package com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.repository
 
com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services - package com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services
 
contextLoads() - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.Bucketlist.BucketlistApplicationTests
 
createCategory(CategoryDTO) - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.controllers.AppController
This method calls the categoryService to create a category according to the specification retrieved in the categoryDTO.
createCategory(CategoryDTO) - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services.CategoryService
This method creates a category based on the information provided by the categoryDTO received from the REST Controller.
createGoal(GoalDTO) - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.controllers.AppController
This method calls the goalService to create a goal after receiving the information from the goalDTO from the Request Body of the HTTP Request
createGoal(GoalDTO) - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services.GoalService
This method creates a Goal based on the information provided by the GoalDTO received from the REST Controller.
createStep(StepDTO) - Method in class com.bucketlist.aaron.bucketlist.services.StepService
